Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxie.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which handles all database connections. works by the CRUD standard.
    Author:
    Maxie

        Returns:

      • updateExp

        Selects a character and updates its experience points with an UPDATE query
        Parameters:

        exp - experience points to add

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.Integer charId)
        Creates a DELETE query to remove specified character from the database
        Parameters:

      • search

        public java.util.List search(java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.String searchQ)
        Creates a search query by predefined search options
        Parameters:
        type - specifies which columns to execute query on
        searchQ - specifies what to search for, by default values for class and race is chosen from enumeration while name uses a wildcard
        Returns:
        List of all found entries
